Quirinea.KentLove: Oh, I used to drink this with my best buddies, long ago. Thank you very much!
Quirinea.PamViina: Now this is something! Real strong stuff!
Quirinea.GusBrandy: The aroma of your excellent wine really comes out when it's distilled and aged. Thank you!
Quirinea.LinusSake: This beverage really brings me good memories from my travels!
Quirinea.PierreWhisky: Oh, a bottle of your excellent aged Whisky. This will please the Governor! Thank you very much!
Quirinea.WizardBev: This is excellent. This beverage has special powers beyond mere alcohol. It is very useful for my studies.
